page.title: 13EDUCATION
page.content: There are 2 educational institutions in the area. Mid-Kent College of Higher and Further Education at Horsted was set up in 1967 as Medway College of Technology. Today it has a roll of 1400 full time; 3200 part time and 1100 evening students.There are 300 full time lecturers; 400 part time and 300 none teaching staff. Courses offered are professional,diploma,vocational, teachnical and computing.There is a sister campus at Oakwood, Maidstone which has about the same student intake and shares in the institutions functions. A quarter of a mile South and West of the college is Horsted C.P. School. This mixed primary school has a roll of 350 and has 12 teachers.
